compounddef.title: ISSAME Test If Two Arrays Are Identical

sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: Tests for two arrays to be identical. The syntax for its use is y = issame(a,b) where a and b are two arrays to compare. This comparison succeeds only if a and b are of the same data type, size, and contents. Unlike numerical equivalence tests, the issame function considers NaN to be equal in both arguments.
